mapper.select: select count(*) from camper where member_id = #{id}
select count(*) from camper where member_id = #{id} and member_pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into camper (member_id, member_pwd, member_type, member_name, email, birthday, post, addr1, addr2) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{member_type}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2})
